# usesScreenFontsDocumentAttribute

**Type Property**

The screen fonts attribute.

## Declaration

```swift
static let usesScreenFontsDocumentAttribute: NSAttributedString.Key
```

## Discussion

The value of this attribute is an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSNumber] object containing a Boolean; this attribute corresponds to the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AppKit/NSLayoutManager/usesScreenFonts] method of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AppKit/NSLayoutManager]; if absent, follows the system default setting.

## Deprecated Keys

- **expansion**: The expansion factor of the text.
- **obliqueness**: The obliqueness of the text.
- **verticalGlyphForm**: The vertical glyph form of the text.
- **characterShapeAttributeName**: The character shape attribute.
